website_summaries.verdict: A concentration of 250 ppm or 500 ppm of colloidal silver in deionized water for immune support.
pros: Sold in concentrations of 250 ppm and 500 ppm colloidal silver
Used to support the immune system, and clear up viruses, illnesses, and diseases
Dose size is 1 teaspoon per day
Take for up to 2 weeks at a time
cons: Dropper bottle only contains 6 doses or servings
Some felt it didn't work as expected

customer_reviews.title: I had a bad toothache that needed a root canal so I did ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a bad toothache that needed a root canal so I did some research. I came across this beautiful jewel. I swish about two teaspoons 3 times a day for about 5 mins. In between I'd take a cotton ball and put some on the cotton ball, sit it on my tooth for about 15 to 20 minutes. The next day the ache was 85 percent gone. My second family, her husband ad a bad tooth and I gave him a couple teaspoons and his pain went immediately
customer_reviews.author: Mone't Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Ordering more!
customer_reviews.text: Very potent and effective in killing infections of all kinds. Got rid of a staph infection (MRSA) on my leg after 6 months of battling with it. Did the recommended dosage for 9 days along with topical treatment. It also miraculously got rid of a kidney infection with only one dosage. I felt immediately better after taking one dosage and it hasnt come back. This is a miracle product and also best value for the money! Thank you Natural Path Silver Wings
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Conley

customer_reviews.title: In just two days it settled all the phlegm and wiped my respiratory system.
customer_reviews.text: Colloidal Silver is awesome. In my house, we use it in countless ways, for example: UTI, tooth infection, mold, food preservation, etc. It is a good support for the immune system, thanks to its antibacterial properties. My first tried was when I get cold. I have much pus in the throat and a cough that has not stopped two weeks. I do not like antibiotics, but then I used this stuff. In just two days it settled all the phlegm and wiped my respiratory system. This is the best thing I ever bought. I don't have to go to the doctor for antibiotics anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Go ahead, make my day!

customer_reviews.title: Sense of smell came back
customer_reviews.text: i laid down with head tilted back, placed a few drops in each nostril and inhaled. A few minutes after i could breathe more deeply, started noticing i was picking up on new scents that i did not notice before. So i believe this killed off a lung infection or bacteria of some sort that i have had for some time. Product definitely works way better than nano silver and all of the other brands that i have tried.
customer_reviews.author: jerad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Natural Antibiotic with no side effects!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Dad who has COPD and allergies. He used to get lung infections a lot. Now whenever that starts to happen, he puts a few drops in his nebulizer and it clears it right up. I've used it up my nose for sinus infections and in my eyes for pink eye. Works every time!
customer_reviews.author: R Seals

customer_reviews.title: This product is great for so many things
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for so many things. My hubby was having some nerve pain from shingles and it gave him some relief.
customer_reviews.author: OuOkie

customer_reviews.title: How are you supposed to take it exactly?
customer_reviews.text: My only problem was I wasn’t 100% sure how to take it. I took one teaspoon the day I got it and it significantly reduced the pain and swelling of a tooth ache. I took a second teaspoon the next day (almost the whole bottle) and the pain left completely and swelling was soon to leave too. I had for years not been able to chew on one side because of pain from broken fill that I never took care of but after taking the colloidal Silver I could chew on either side with no pain at all. I am short on cash but I would sacrifice to have this in my home, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mir

customer_reviews.title: Silver saves me every time!
customer_reviews.text: Silver saves me every time. Recently went on vacation where everyone was sick from the resort food except for me the crazy lady who drinks silver LOL
customer_reviews.author: frenchcocoa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff, i received it yesterday, i had pink eye and very bad cold, startedd taking internally last night, and diluted it with water and coconut oil, and put drops in my eyes. It's about 28 hours later, and my eyes are clear, and i barely have a cough..love it
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Really works good, have used it for stomach infections, cold, sinus infection (put a drop in each nostril) at least 3 times a day when we are getting sick. Works like a charm.

customer_reviews.title: Works welll, I have used it for my dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: Works welll, I have used it for my dogs runny eyes and have used it for small cuts, burns and scrapes.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Pagan

customer_reviews.title: No Taste, Easy to Swallow
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ever bought Colloidal Silver but I have heard over and over of the benefits. I have constant sores that no one knows what they are. I used this both topically and orally for the sores. They improved greatly. I chose the 250 Ppm to begin with. I was concerned it would taste bad but no real taste to cause me to dread taking it. I really am very pleased with this brand. I will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Kymba Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!! We use it when we start to feel sick and I swear it works!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fry

customer_reviews.title: Never want to be without.
customer_reviews.text: Very potent and powerful Natural antibiotic. I mix about 30 drops into a bottle of 30ppm for an added boost. I have on Subscribe and Save so always have a backup. Never know when someone will get sick of injured. Including injuries on pets!
customer_reviews.author: Kprit

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my daughter's ear infection. I applied 2 drops at night and once again during the day. Pain has subsided! I also used it on my piercing it got a little red and a drop of this and it's healing normally again.
customer_reviews.author: Addie renteria

customer_reviews.title: Results.
customer_reviews.text: I gotta tell you that people think this is snake oil, and maybe some of them are; but this gets results: I've seen infections in throats cured in one day,complete relief from sinus infections, I've seen it bring down a fever from 102.5 to normal in less than an hour after trying other things for days. If it's fake then I don't understand after all these years why it's so consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Umlor

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. It is very effective for bug bites. My husband used it to stop the itching on his arms. He works construction and where he was working there were no-see-um bugs. They ate his arms up. He started scratching and the colloidal silver calmed down the itch within minutes. We applied it a few times, but eventually it went away completely after a few application. It is much better than those cortisone creams that are recommended. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Smith

customer_reviews.title: Colloidal Silver Best Kept Secret!!
customer_reviews.text: Like everything. I have nothing negative to say. I have actually cured my Mom's bedsores and have also kept them in check.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Villa

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: We are a pretty avid natural healing and prevention family, but don't forgo Western medicine. This is one of the best silver products I have purchased, and we keep on hand regularly. It lasts a long time because of the high strength (ppm). We take a few drops daily with our Vitimin C drink and I really think it helps keep us from getting sick as often. If we do come down with something, we take a bit more and I truly belive it helps us "beat" whatever "bug" we have. It's safe for animals and you can use topically as well. Silver is a natural antimicrobial, and I really like this brand the best. Virtually no taste.
customer_reviews.author: Julsie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Cleared up our New pups ear mites in just a few days!! Put a drop in each ear twice a day it did wonders!!!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewmama

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is so wonderful! I received a cat scratch and after I ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so wonderful ! I received a cat scratch and after I cleaned the wound put this silver on and it probably saved me from an infection. I use it on any marks on my skin and also it has always prevented a full blown cold or flu. Everyone should have this in their home for first aid.
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter told me that she uses Colloidal Silver for her family and I have been really sick with a head cold and chest congestion for almost a week now and it just keeps getting worse. I ordered this Friday and got it this afternoon, took 1 teaspoon about 5 hours ago and I am already feeling better. Hopefully it will all be gone by tomorrow or the next day. If it isn't I will get back on here and let you know. But I have faith it is going to be gone. My head and nose is already 75% better and my chest congestion is 75% better.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: She's good as new now
customer_reviews.text: after reading up on it I was too scared to use it myself, but it helped my cat clear up a respiratory thing she had going on that made it sound likes she couldn't breathe well. She's good as new now...though I'm not 100% sure it was this product but it did clear up shortly after I put it in her food
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Beshears

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Works wonders on colds. No taste at all. I keep colloidal silver in my house all the time.

customer_reviews.title: No more tooth pain!
customer_reviews.text: I was having some severe toothpain and could see a cavity starting on my one tooth, however even though we have dental insurance I still would have to pay a lot out of pocket. I have been using colloidal silver for 2 days and my tooth pain is almost non -existent and I can see the cavity actually getting smaller. I do not know if it will last, but I will continue using it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Karen LeConey

customer_reviews.title: Colloidal Silver Mineral Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I definitely can't testify that this product works. I watched a video on the health benefits this product is supposed to provide. I have bad skin break outs and I thought that by having an increase in silver in my diet would help my immune system fight skin bacteria. This product has done nothing to clear up my skin break out. I will continue to add it to my bottled water until it is finished since I paid good money for it and it doesn't seem to be doing anything negative to me. I don't recommend this product for fighting acne or any type of skin problems.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's tasteless and has lessened the frequency of urinary tract infections I was having.

customer_reviews.title: Prevented root canal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading online that it can help prevent root canals. I don't have insurance and my tooth started hurting really bad. My dentist told me if that same tooth started hurting again that I would need a possible root canal. I used the colloidal silver and the pain went away within a couple days. Never needed a root canal for the tooth.

customer_reviews.title: Cures Cough Overnight
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical since I never use any essential oils, but I had a really bad cough for months and the constant antibiotics weren't helping. I was told by my boss to try taking a tablespoon of this before bed. The taste was metallic, but not overpowering. When I woke up in the morning, the cough was GONE. It's been weeks since I used this and it never came back. Definitely will use it again!

customer_reviews.text: Completely happy with this product. This is the first time I ordered it. Quality, packaging, and availability was all excellent.

customer_reviews.title: For the Kit-Kats
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for about 3-4 months for our 2 kitties. They have some issues including stomatitis (3 y/o) and vestibular/upper respiratory (15 y/o) rescues. Despite a raw diet of fine feline food from Primal, they still had some issues with healing the stomatitis and chronic URIs quickly and consistently. This along with Lysine is keeping them healthy. My 15 year old cat runs around and drives us crazy now thanks to 3-4 drops of this 2x daily and lysine in her meals. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Dishonest, sad Loss of trust.
customer_reviews.text: Rip off by packaging. Not 250 ppm it was a spray bottle with 50 ppm. I am sure it will be corrected. But why blindly accept that there is any quality control. Consumer warning may be critical. What could be in the bottle?

We decided to learn how to do our own silver with a colloidal silver maker, and it couldn't be any easier. Plus you pay pennies on the dollar compared to this stuff.

It's not a miracle healing solution but if used over time, it helps very much. I use this topically but it is also ok to ingest. My doctor advised against ingesting colloidal silver and since I take a few different medications, I will follow his advice.

She wouldnt let me touch her back teeth and now I can without her yelping. I love this product! I used two drops in my ear as well for a earache and within maybe two days my ear stopped pulsating in pain! I highly recommend! Taste wise, is fine. I put a drop on my finger before giving it to my pup and it had no taste.

customer_reviews.title: Was not effective.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t seem to work as well as the previous brand I used, but don’t really know why.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This really does work! I used to use 50 ppm with little seen results. This is highly effective! with no taste. perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mita

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, works well and faster than reg 10ppm... would not use this on a daily basis though. But that's just me... I use it in when we are sick.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have used it with success on sore gums and sinus infections.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Flatt

product_meta.title: Natural Path Silver Wings Colloidal Silver Mineral Supplement, 250 Ppm, 1 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: Natural Path Silver Wings Colloidal Silver Mineral Supplement, 250 Ppm, 1 Fluid Ounce
feature_bullets: STRONG IMMUNE SUPPORT*: Natural Path Silver Wings Colloidal Silver 250PPM is our most versatile strength. 25 times stronger (more silver particles) than 10PPM silver solutions. Higher PPM strength offers convenience of less dosages per day. Properly prepared pharmaceutical grade colloidal silver is safe to use in higher PPM strengths and concentrations. When need for daily immune support, you can consume 4-28 drops of Silver Wings Colloidal Silver 250PPM. 4 drops of 250PPM is approximately 10PPM.

SMALL SILVER PARTICLES ARE MORE BIOAVAILABLE. Natural Path / Silver Wings Colloidal Silver average silver particles range from 0.6nm – 3nm. It is easily absorbed and readily available for your body’s immune support needs. Silver Wings Colloidal Silver is safe, more bioavailable and effective for immune support than competing brands.

WHAT IS PARTS PER MILLION (PPM)? PPM (STRENGTH) is the number of silver particles per serving yields greater concentration and increased immune support. Silver Wings offers products in 50PPM, 150PPM, 250PPM, and 500PPM.

IS COLLOIDAL SILVER SAFE? Yes. Due to the unparalleled silver particle size, Silver Wings Colloidal Silver is safe for the whole family. Properly prepared pharmaceutical grade colloidal silver is safe to use in higher PPM strengths and concentrations. Natural Path / Silver Wings is the oldest (since 1994) colloidal silver manufacturer in the United States.

AMBER COLOR IS KEY: Silver Wings is made from naturally occurring elemental Silver, which has a color. It is not ionic or electrically processed. The higher PPM, the darker the amber color colloidal silver suspension (liquid) will appear.

GMP CERTIFIED & QUALIFIED 3RD PARTY INDEPENDENT LABORATORY VERIFICATION- Natural Path / Silver Wings manufacturing and distribution facility is UL cGMP certified and FDA inspected. Silver Wings verifies PPM, silver particle size, stability, pH, etc. at Qualified Independent Third Party Laboratories. Both UL and FDA review the in house testing and independent laboratory verification.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
